directions: In a blender, blend coriander and serrano with 1/4 cup orange juice until mixture forms a smooth paste. Add remaining 3/4 cup orange juice, zest, Tequila, broth and avocados and blend until smooth. Pour mixture through a coarse sieve into a large bowl and add white pepper and salt to taste.
Chill soup, covered, 2 hours, or until cold.
ingredients: 1 serrano chile, seeded and minced (wear rubber gloves)
2 California avocados (about 1 pound), pitted, peeled and chopped coarse
Garnish: 2 cups chopped, peeled seeded watermelon
title: Sopa de Aguacate
